doc.previous: At the same time the Cultural Revolution was under way Two films Shangguan had appeared in Early Spring in February and Stage Sister had been denounced as huge poisonous weeds 4 She was also under severe persecution for her alleged affair with Mao She was badly beaten by followers of Mao s wife Jiang Qing 4 6 who gave her an ultimatum to confess her relationship with Mao 8 At 3 am on 23 November 1968 4 6 Shangguan Yunzhu jumped from her apartment in the Wukang Mansion to her death 9
doc.after: Several biographies have been published in Chinese about Shangguan Yunzhu s life
